name: A Beautiful Game (Design Project)
description:
This project, seperated into 2 different parts, was a way for me to learn more about designing high-visual-quality scenes/environments, and the capabilities of the Unity HD Render Pipeline, materials, and post-processing.

This project is not a game, but rather 2 different 3D scenes that I've created.

Both are explorable via either a first-person character perspective (scifi) or a free-flying camera (office).

Alt-F4 to quit.
